posts.text:
Good old Ssangyong Musso, ‘96 diesel, M.Benz engine, 190,000 km, maual transmission, in Reykjavik,
-> price: 150,000 kr + 50,000 kr for the extra set of winter tires; reason sale: leaving Iceland - VERY SOON!
Góður gamall Ssangyong Musso, ‘96, dísil, M.Benz vél, 190þ km, verð 150þ + 50þ kr fyrir nagladekk
